posts.post_content:
Upgrading my set to the PSA 4-5 range and need about 100 cards.   Would consider everything from PSA 3-6.   Buying one at a time on EBay isn’t very efficient so I’m looking for larger lots where we can work on a good deal for both of us.   Reach out and let’s work on  deal.

[url]Bkrumwiede@comcast.net[/url]
Completed a couple of nice deals.    Anyone else out there?
